channel.title: Comments on: Autopower Race Roll Bar

item.title: By: In-Between – not4kds
item.dc:creator: In-Between – not4kds
item.description: […] to cut my losses and sell off my old roll bar instead. My very first idea, as shown by the original Auto Power roll bar‘s paint color influence, was to have stainless steel tubing and a raw finish. I went the long […]

item.title: By: M2 / Raceshop Roll Bar – not4kds
item.dc:creator: M2 / Raceshop Roll Bar – not4kds
item.description: […] roll bar and left me open holes that needed patching. I instead filled them by installing an Autopower bar of my own. Its overall quality was so-so which lead me to perceive it as too vanilla. Being less than […]

item.title: By: Sequential Turbos | Grand Mighty

item.title: By: Banzai Differential Brace & Transmission Crossmember | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: Banzai Differential Brace & Transmission Crossmember | Grand Mighty
item.description: [...] the Banzai differential brace took an entire afternoon to do and was a pain. The job reminded me of installing the roll bar, because there were so many points to bolt-in (6 total) and the tolerances were small. Everything [...]
